title: 8 Bit Era Retro Sounds
description: The 80s and 90s were a gorgeous era and this pack is a tribute to that
longDescription:
You can use this pack in whatever game you want, any game genre with whatever mechanics because we focused on HOW your game looks instead of WHAT game genre your game is.

If your game LOOKS like any 8-bit game this pack is for you!

These Sounds were made in a Music Tracker to keep alive the ESSENCE of the real 8-Bit Sounds!


Demo here:https://youtu.be/Ih9A9pPl-rw?si=ONdIFlorfJmAo1lU


File list here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1PdHETDlxPU5taxfZpnBytn8CIVagtZEO/view?usp=sharing
technicalDetails:
Categories Included:

  • Ambience Nature Environment
  • Alarm Warning
  • Attack Slash Cut
  • Block Shielding
  • Car Engine Motorbike Drift
  • Collect Item Pick Up Drop Coin
  • Damage Hurt Hit
  • Death Falling
  • Dizzy Stun
  • Explosion Destruction Crash
  • Gate Door Chest Window
  • Melodic
  • Power Up Buff Nerf
  • Race Start Lights
  • Jump Movement Bounce Whoosh
  • Skill Spell Magic Cast
  • UI Menu Inventory Dialogue Error
  • Voice Male Female
  • Weapon Shot Laser Gun


Number of Audio Waves: 280

Number of Audio Cues: 280

Sample rate/bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16Bit

Do Sound FX loop: Some Yes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows:Yes

Mac:Yes
